footer_privacy.zh-cn: 我们通过 Microsoft Clarity 了解您使用我们网站的方式，从而改进我们的产品。使用我们的网站即表示您同意我们和 Microsoft 可以收集和使用这些数据。参阅 Microsoft 隐私声明了解更多详细信息。
footer_privacy.en: We improve our products by using Microsoft Clarity to see how you use our website. By using our site, you agree that we and Microsoft can collect and use this data. See Microsoft Privacy Statement for more details.

footer_links.zh-cn: 由 GitHub 和 Vercel 强力驱动
footer_links.en: Powered by GitHub and Vercel

footer_time.zh-cn: 本站已经不稳定运行了 {0} 天 {1} 时 {2} 分 {3} 秒，可喜可贺！
footer_time.en: This site has been running for {0} days, {1} hours, {2} minutes and {3} seconds.

home_intro_1.zh-cn: CodeForces Powerful Viewer 是一个用于辅助 CodeForces 比赛和做题的项目。
home_intro_1.en: CodeForces Powerful Viewer is a helper for CodeForces contests and problems.

home_intro_2.zh-cn: 如果你认为 CodeForces 官方的 UI 界面不够美观、可自定义程度不高的话，那就来试试吧！点击下面这个按钮跳转到比赛页面并开始使用。
home_intro_2.en: If you think the official CodeForces UI isn't pretty and customizable enough, then try this! Click the button below to jump to the contest page and get started.

home_about_1.zh-cn: CodeForces Powerful Viewer 是一个开源项目，采用 MPLv2 作为许可证，你可以在 GitHub 仓库 查看代码、提出建议和发起 Pull Request 等。
home_about_1.en: CodeForces Powerful Viewer is an open source project under the MPLv2 license. You can view the source code, open Issues, open Pull Requests, etc. at the GitHub repository.

home_about_2.zh-cn: 本项目以 Fomantic UI 作为 UI 框架，在代码方面参考了 CCHv2，在此提出感谢。
home_about_2.en: This project uses Fomantic UI, and the code implementation was inspired by CCHv2, special thanks to them.
